Text: damn...i was in a hurry because i am leaving for the weekend and wanted to get a couple movies up...by the way, wtf is up with the trackers

Just download Firefox and Adblock Plus add-on.  Sometimes I forget that TPB even has ads, cuz I cant see them!

Something definitely goes wrong with TPB every day, but it is still so much better than any other torrent site out there that it is worth the occasional suffering and inability to edit your uploads, lol.

hi ctang,
Remember Layer Cake? (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5604418), there are 8 leechers stuck at 99,8% is there any way you could seed this movie again?

Everyone take a look at this:

http://thepiratebay.org/search/ntsc/0/3/202

That is a link to search for NTSC in the DVDr category.  Look at the seeders for each torrent.  Only the torrent that say NL subs or Swedish have any seeds at all.  Everything else has 1-3 seeds or 0 seeds.  Is there a problem with the trackers we are using?  My latest upload is taking forever to get out there, already twice as long as the one before it and still only halfway there.  Any suggestions?
